long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't you wanna quickly capture text from someone's shared screen?
this is the tool that we can capture text from screenshot quickly!

For example, you have zoom or google meet mtg then they share the screen, but we cannot capture the text quickly like copy and paste, then this tool comes in handy.

we can take screenshot from this extension in popup then crop th text you want, then eventually get the text in popup screen.

you try this rather than waiting! your work will be more productive in remote mtg!
